thread.title: Ellen Carusetta
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Ellen Carusetta

author: Ellen Carusetta
title: Ellen Carusetta
text: We worked with Michael Riggilio to plan a custom trip to Italy with a focus on Sicily. Michael was patient and accomodating throughout the process. He found us suitable accomodations and excellent tour guides through all of the trip. Travel went off without a hitch. Each hotel had its own particular charm. We saw many and varied sites. When we encountered a problem with an airline, he dealt with it quickly and efficiently. We would not hesitate to use Goway and Michael again.
